titleSection.name: VersionOne Integration for ClearQuest
titleSection.shortDescription: Triage defects and include them in the planning process to balance new work and maintenance.

descriptionSection.description: Triage defects and include them in the planning process to balance new work and maintenance. Leverage existing automated workflows and defect reporting, while adding the practice of agile project management. This integration creates defects in VersionOne based on defects in ClearQuest. Using this integration your organization can manage and triage defects reported by customers and promote them to VersionOne once you determine a fix is necessary. Once the integraion is installed and configured, ClearQuest users can assign defects to VersionOne and they appear as Defects in the VersionOne repository. When the VersionOne defect is closed, the integration updates the ClearQuest repository to relfect this change.

updates.releaseNotes:
* Fixed: reopen scenario so reopening ClearQuest defects creates new VersionOne workitems with link to previous item 
 * Fixed: problem with selecting custom VersionOne field for reference

* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy. 
 * Added: Configuration Utility contains help on the various configuration options to enable quicker setup and configuration. 
 * Added: Configuration Utility supports a minimum poll interval of one minute for testing. It is not recommended that poll intervals remain this low in a production instance. 
 * Update: Source code project was dependent on .NET 3.5. Now source code project depends on the latest .NET SDK. 
 * Updated: Integration depends on Log4Net 
 * Updated: Poll time interval defaults to 30 minutes 
 * Fixed: Configuration Utility allows editing of the VersionOne credential fields when Windows Integrated Authentication is enabled. This enables configuring the integrations to connect to VersionOne as a user other than the local service account when the VersionOne instance is configured for Windows integrated authentication.
Added support for mapping projects and priority values

* Configuration tool writes correct XML element Names 
 * Integration skips defects with a source value but no reference number.

* Added GUI Tool for configuration 
 * Updated Documentation
Add ClearQuest entity details to configuration

seed.shortDescription: The initial idea of a product. May not be stable code.

sapling.shortDescription: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

mature.shortDescription: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
